name: YoungPicasso
0:
”Alexa, launch Young Picasso and play”
”Alexa, ask Young Picasso for the next piece”
”Alexa, ask Young Picasso how to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: young picasso
des: Young Picasso is played by asking Alexa to launch Young Picasso, then asking to start a game. You will be given a unique piece to draw. Then, keep asking for a piece until you have a complete character. When you're done, you can compare your drawing with everyone else who played. This game is fun for artists of all ages.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
